document.full_text: marion bartoli turned the pressure of playing at her home grand slam into a driving force on tuesday as she became the first frenchwoman to reach the roland garros semi-finals since 2005.
document.title: open-bartoli fuelled by crowd support
lines_and_colors: marion bartoli turned the pressure of playing at her home grand slam into a driving force on tuesday as she became the first frenchwoman to reach the roland garros semi-finals since 2005.
